messages.subject: Re: Imaginary Friends
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/6/2003 11:53:29 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... Oh, I know, and I do miss them. They all had names like Moe and Joe and Bo, etc... And you
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/6/2003 11:53:29 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

> ROFLOL LMHO...I and my daughter are laughing SO HARD...hee hee
>
> squirrels in his hair has GOT to be the best imaginary friends I've
> ever heard of! LOL
>
>

Oh, I know, and I do miss them. They all had names like Moe and Joe and Bo,
etc... And you have to understand about Julian's hair -- he has thick, very
curly hair that gets long fast, and that he never combs, so it looks entirely
possible that critters could be living in there.

And we WOULD have conversations....I'd find myself having a long, interesting
conversation (most often with Joe, who was a little
less...well...insane....than some of them, and would SWEAR i saw a squirrel, talking before me.

I mentioned to Julian the other day that I missed the squirrels, and he said
he understood, but "It's just as well, Mama...by now they would have had to
tear down the disco and build an insane asylum."

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
